# Codexidian

Native Obsidian side-panel UI for Codex via `codex app-server`.

## Usage

1. Enable **Codexidian** in Obsidian community plugins.
2. Open command palette: `Open Codexidian`.
3. Chat in the right-side panel.

## Notes

- Requires local `codex` CLI installed and authenticated.
- Default command on Windows: `codex.cmd`.
- Uses persistent thread id by default (can be disabled in settings).
- Approval callbacks can be auto-approved (toggle in settings).
